definitions.definition: Large , senior ( high-ranking ) , intense , extreme , or exceptional

subdefinitions.definition: Of a large size or extent; great .
Great in size, and fine or imposing in appearance or impression; illustrious , dignified , magnificent .
examples: His simple vision has transformed into something far more grand .

subdefinitions.definition: Having higher rank or more dignity, size, or importance than other persons or things of the same name.

definitions.definition: Standing in the second or some more remote degree of parentage or descent ( see grand- ) .

examples: A cup of tea? That'd be grand .
definitions.label_groups: Ireland , Northern England , colloquial , otherwise dated

definitions.definition: Containing all the parts proper to a given form of composition .

main_definition: ( augmentative ) Large , senior ( high-ranking ) , intense , extreme , or exceptional
secondary_definitions: ( usually in compound forms ) Standing in the second or some more remote degree of parentage or descent ( see grand- ) .
( Ireland , Northern England , colloquial , otherwise dated ) Fine ; lovely .
( music ) Containing all the parts proper to a given form of composition .
